ctx: intros a b nZb p q canon_a canon_b div_ab.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b p, q : list (Term A n) canon_a : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) canon_b : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) div_ab : divP A A0 eqA multA divA n a b Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n (spminusf ?M2154 ?M2155 ?M2156 ?M2157 ?M2158) (spminusf ?M2154 ?M2155 ?M2156 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M2154 ?M2157) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M2155 ?M2158))" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) (divTerm (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) divA (n:=n) a (b:=b) nZb) q)) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (mults multA (n:=n) (divTerm (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) divA (n:=n) a (b:=b) nZb) q))".

original: intros a b nZb p q canon_a canon_b div_ab. unfold spminusf. apply spminusf_extend; auto.
